model.name: Learning Summary Creation - All Requirements Analysis with Sprint 20 Integration
model.description: Create learning-summary.md with dual links to all requirements and PDCAs, following sprint 20 format. Link into sprint 20 with UTC timestamp for DORY mode recovery access.
model.rationale: Learning summary provides consolidated knowledge from all requirements and PDCAs for team benefit and DORY mode recovery. Sprint 20 integration ensures easy access during future sessions.
acceptance_criteria: Create learning-summary.md with dual links to PDCAs and requirements
Include core learnings with dual link references
Create UTC timestamped link in sprint 20 directory
Ensure easy DORY mode recovery access
Document all session learnings and requirements

technical_details.sprint20_integration: Link with UTC timestamp in sprint 20 directory
technical_details.dory_recovery: Easy access during future DORY moments

model.implementation_notes: This consolidates all session learnings and requirements for future reference and DORY mode recovery.
